title: Test Fix Ledger
description: Tracks the state of test failures through the automated test-fix workflow. Each entry represents a single test failure progressing through discovery, diagnosis, fix attempts, and resolution.

session_id.description: Unique identifier for this test-fix session (UUID v4)

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the ledger was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last ledger update

initial_failure_count.description: Number of test failures discovered in the initial /test-analyze run

entries.description: List of test failure entries tracked by the ledger

file.description: Path to the test file containing the failure

test.description: Full test name including describe block (e.g., 'describe > test name')

status.description: Current status of this failure entry

attempt_count.description: Number of fix attempts made so far

diagnosis.description: Root cause diagnosis from the fix agent

fix_applied.description: Description of the fix that was applied

escalation_reason.description: Reason for escalation if status is 'escalated'

modified_files.description: List of file paths modified to fix this failure
